1.content:
It was just another day at Smash Stadium for the fighters of Super Smash Bros Ultimate. Except today, the male fighters have gathered in the men's locker room to plot this year's prank on the females.

"Ook ook ook!" Diddy Kong uttered first. Given his love for fruit and mischief, his idea seemed to involve banana peels.

"Wahahaha!" Wario chimed in next. "How about we set up a fake charity or something? The girls would feel so sorry for us, we'd be swimming in coins for days!"

"We'd best be methodical about our prank..." Robin spoke up.

"Way ahead of you!" Shulk smiled, removing a sheet from atop a strange-looking machine. "Ness and I perfected this beauty last night. With this device, we'll become impossible for the girls to detect!"

"And HOW do you expect this to work, exactly?" Meta Knight asked. "Because Kirby's already pressing buttons."

The masked swordsman turned out to be correct - the pink puffball, ever curious and clueless, was slamming his hands on the machine's various buttons at random, much to the others' worry. "Poyo~!"

Shulk paled as Kirby neared a big, red, dangerous-looking button. "NO! DON'T -- "

CLICK! With that catastrophic button pressed, the entire machine glowed an eerie green, firing beams of the same color at everyone in the room.

"Kirby, you idiot!!" King Dedede yelled as the room seemed to gradually grow for him and the other guys...but in mere seconds, they all blacked out. Thankfully, they weren't awake to hear the device explode in a fiery burst. By then, everyone in the room was roughly half an inch tall.

Who wakes up first?
1.title: I've heard of Tiny Smash, but this is ridiculous!

11.content:
"Mamma mia..."

Mario was the first of the affected fighters to wake up. Rubbing his aching head, the plumber looked around at the now-gigantic locker room. He and the other pranksters were now shrunken! Spotting his unconscious brother Luigi nearby, Mario rushed over to try waking him as well. Alas, not even the waters of FLUDD seemed to work. Luigi always was a heavy sleeper.

They needed help. With his unwavering courage, Mario bolted out of the room in hopes of finding some normal-sized aid. Soon enough, the red-clad hero heard gigantic footsteps approaching his current location...

Who was coming?
11.title: The Pint-Sized Plumber

choices: Mario goes unnoticed as Samus goes past him and Luigi.
Samus notices Mario and is concerned by the hero's new size.
Samus notices Mario, but relaxes, believing that the fighter just ate mushrooms.
112.content:
Samus, in her sportswear, entered the room and compared to the unofficial knight of the Mushroom Kingdom, she was the size of a mountain! Then again, at 6 feet and 3 inches, the bounty hunter was towered over most of the fighters to begin with. She looked around the room, raising an eyebrow.

Mario assumed that she must have heard them when the accident happened. "Hello? Anyone?" Samus called out, putting up a defensive stance. After a bit of silence, the bounty hunter activated her Varia Suit and slowly stepped further into the room. "SAMUS! DOWN HERE!" The red plumber shouted, waving his arms frantically to get the bounty hunter's attention.
112.title: Samus, The Legendary Bounty Hunter

choices: She manages to find the other shrunken fighters.
She only manages to find some of the shrunken fighters.
Unfortunately, she's unable to find anyone else.
1122.content:
The bounty hunter looked down at her feet...and noticed a tiny Mario waving his arms. Wide eyed and raising an eyebrow, Samus knelt down, asking, "How the hell did you...?" "Freak accident. We don't know how to get back to normal." The Italian said, figuring it would be best to not tell the bounty hunter the full details. He'd rather not suffer her wrath at this size.

Nodding, the bounty hunter picked up the Mario Brothers. "Is it just you two in here? Or were the others in here as well?" She asked. Mario shrugged, "They were when the accident happened. Don't know if they're still here though." Nodding, Samus began looking for the rest of the group...
1122.title: Samus notices Mario and is concerned by the her...

choices: Hide them in her room and under her helmet.
Someone's coming! Hide them in her Varia Suit!
11222.content:
After a couple minutes, Samus managed to find the other fighters. While she only found Link, Pit, Meta Knight, Ike, Marth, Joker (the Persona 5 protagonist), and Snake, it was certainly better than no one. After one last check through the room, the bounty hunter finally left with the eight fighters in hand.

"I'll need to let the others know about the situation. Perhaps they can help find everyone else." She said. The fighters nodded in agreement, however, one question remained. "Where are we going to stay until we're back to normal?" Link asked. "We can't exactly get into our rooms like this."

Snake and Joker nodded in agreement, with the former saying, "And staying out in the open is far too dangerous." The bounty hunter nodded, before tapping her chin as she thought what to do.
11222.title: She only manages to find some of the shrunken f...

12.content:
Link slowly woke up and looked around. Everybody had become tiny, even himself. The small hero felt confident though. After all, he heard a story about one of his past lives saving Hyrule by shrinking, and Link was young in the story. If a younger version of him could survive tiny, then so could he.

Link pulled out his Sheikah Slate (which had also been shrunken down) and switched to the Master Cycle Zero. When he tried to summon it, the bike appeared at his size. He smiled and climbed on. He looked at the others for a moment before driving off.

Link rode through the halls, searching for someone to help him. Luckily, he had refueled before arriving at the arena so he didn’t need to worry about fuel. As the boy drove, he noticed how big everything was. He realized that he needed to be extra careful. One wrong move and he could be crushed in an instant.

As he turned the corner, he noticed somebody was coming out of the bathroom. It was…
12.title: A fast way to travel

choices: He got stomped under Isabelle's foot
He jumped on Isabelle's foot Safeley
121.content:
Link was relived that from all fighters, he caught up with one of them most calm and friendliest ones.

"HEY ISABELLE" link shouted in a attempt to get Isabelle's attention but she didn't hear him, maybe because that she was saying yo herself "I'm late i'm late i'm late" one and again.

Link didn't want to have a mayor risk with other fighters so, decided, he tan towards where Isabelle is goint to go when...
121.title: Isabelle's Late

13.content:
Kirby- sensing things were wrong- set off on his star- blasting away out of the stage before being hit by the green blast. His vision faded as he tumbled from the sky- his last view was the edge of the stage as he tumbled out of bounds.

...

Kirby awoke a little later. Rubbing his eyes, he glanced around. It looked like he had landed in the Mushroom Kingdom's roofs of all places. Hopping to his feet, he looked upwards into the sky- unsure how he fell to this location. Then again, they didn't fully understand all the rules of the arena's, it wasn't like they were playing an official match.

Puffing up, Kirby hopped down, bouncing carefully onto a window ledge. Kirby's eyes widened as he saw his fellow combatant, Peach.

Peach was finishing up on a cake she had made, squirting the icing over it with a little hum. Not noticing Kirby hopping up and down on the windowsill as she spoke,
"- I hope Mario will return soon!" Peach smiled, plopping a cherry in as Kirby started to fly over. "I believe I made enough for everyone!" She smiled looking proud of her achievement as Kirby drew closer.

Just as Kirby as about to run out of jumps, a face he didn't notice before popped up. He was so focused on Peach he failed to notice her company. Paniced flailing amounted to nothing as Palutena walked right into him- her face smacking into his body- knocking him down onto her chest.
"I'm sure you have- but surely we could have a little taste-" Palutena boomed, leaning over the cake while covering her mouth to hide her drool and protect the cake.

Kirby could only barely hold onto the jiggling tits, making small noises to try and get her attention as he watched Palutena's gloved hand reach for a knife.

SLAP

Not given a chance to react, Kirby was suddenly flung away from the breast as Peach slapped away the goddess's hand. The giant, oblivious goddess bounced away- her jiggling boobs tossing poor Kirby into the air only to land-
13.title: Kirby's bounce pad

choices: "It must've gone bad. I'd better throw it away..."
131.content:
In his panicked descent, Kirby couldn't bear to look where he was about to land - he simply closed his eyes, bracing himself for whatever surface (or blast zone) awaited him. It didn't take long for the puffball to crash-land in...

*SPLAT!*

...the top layer of Peach's freshly-made cake. Figures.

The pink-dressed princess paused momentarily as she swore she heard something unusual. Putting the icing tube down, Peach glanced down searching for the source of the noise, but only noticed a pink sphere lodged into the top of her cake. Something strange was going on today.

"I don't remember berries being pink..." Peach mused, reaching a gloved hand to pluck up the foreign item from the cake.
131.title: Let Them Eat Cake

choices: Kirby is absorbed/ Pushed out- surviving the experience
Pit saw what happened outside of Peaches stomach and goes in for the rescue
1311.content:
Peach plucked Kirby up- shifting frosting around on the cake to make it look neater.
"There we are!" She smiled.

Kirby's short arms were unable to grab the girls attention as he was lifted to her side while she ajusted the cake. Palutena opened her mouth, egging Peach on.
"I'll catch it-!" Palutena offered, causing Kirby to panic as he gazed upwards at peach. He hoped to see her eyes lock onto him as she glanced at her friend.
"Ok! Ready?" She giggled, the gforces hitting Kirby as Peach positioned him close to her face. Kirby's wiggling went unnoticed- even this close as she lined up the shot. He looked at her face- her eyes just missing him.

Kirby's stomach lurched as he was rocked back and forth as she counted,
"Oooone- twwwwwo-" Peach smiled, while Palutena started to look a little impatient. Neither noticed Kirbies startled face as he looked into Palutena's maw. "Three!" Peach started to toss Kirby.

The tiny ball paniced as the playful princess moved him towards Palutena's dripping maw, before swerving him around towards her own plump lips. Kirby opened his mouth again to try and make a noise but it was too late, his face was quickly pushed into Peaches playful lips- smearing a small amount of lipstick over him before popping the perceived sweet in with a wet slurp. The princess giggled at Palutena's disappointed face as she rolled the sweet around her mouth.

Landing on her tongue, Kirby panicked as the sweet smelling saliva blinded him. Attempting to roll to his feet, suddenly felt a bit of suction before sliding down her throat. He gave a weak yelp before his squishy form was squished down her neck- coated in sticky saliva.

On the outside, Peach went from playful teasing to minor surprise as she swallowed hard, looking uncomfortable as a small bulge passed her collar bone.
"Oh my-" The princess winced, grabbing a pre-poured glass of water while lightly clearing her throat. She took a sip to sooth herself a little. "I didn't expect it to roll to the back of my throat like that-" She spoke, confused and rubbing her throat.
"Serves you right for teasing like that-" Palutena pouted, as Peach reached into the draws and pulled out a jar of cherries.
"Apologies, I thought that would be funny- didn't expect to choke though!" She smiled apologetically, offering the jar of cherries with a practiced smile.

Meanwhile, Kirby dropped into Peaches stomach with a small plop. He surfaced- just to have the luke warm water pour over his head. Crawling to the side, Kirby tried his best to stay out of the acid as he tried to think of a way out.
1311.title: "Oh well. Down the hatch!"

choices: ...dives in the acids to get to the intestines
...dives in the acids but gets digested and absorbed
13112.content:
Within the depths of Peach's stomach, Kirby pondered his escape options on a dry spot of his current fleshy prison. He could attempt to fly up the princess's esophagus, but the pink puff doubted he had enough jumps to float all the way out. Another, less pleasant option then occurred to him: he could dive into the juices, then travel through Peach's intestines and...out the natural way. However, this choice had its risks - Kirby could very well get digested if he spent too long in the bubbling acids.

His mind made up, Kirby...
13112.title: Survival of the Pinkest

choices: Peach and Palutena go to try and find their friends
Palutena suddenly heard Kirby’s thoughts using telepathy
Peach suddenly became very hungry due to Kirby
131123.content:
Kirby decided that finding Peach’s intestine was probably the better way to go. Kirby hesitated for a moment before diving underneath. The acids immediately hurt and made it hard to focus. The puff ball quickly looked around, hoping to find the exit. However, the acids made it extremely difficult to see.

Kirby immediately realized he wouldn’t be able to find the exit in time and tried to pull out. The star warrior’s strength was already failing him, keeping him trapped in the acid. The boy struggled as best as he could, feeling terrified.

Kirby…join me… Kirby swore he heard Peach’s voice, but couldn’t identify where it was coming from. The last of his strength soon got slapped away, leaving him helpless. He closed his eyes, wishing his friends could save him.

Kirby suddenly woke up and became confused. He felt weird and couldn’t seem to move around. It was also pretty dark, the puff ball couldn’t identify what was around him. He was able to hear some voices which sounded pretty loud.

“Ok…just let me change first.” Kirby could identify Peach’s voice. A curtain was suddenly raised in front of him to reveal a mirror. In the mirror stood Peach, who was currently changing into a clean dress. Kirby couldn’t figure out where he was though.

As he was piecing it together, Peach’s stomach suddenly growled loudly. The princess frowned and put her hand to her stomach. As she did, Kirby’s view was partially covered up. He quickly became shocked as he realized what was going on. Kirby’s mind now inhabited Peach’s belly! He tried to squirm or get her attention with no success. The warrior yelled in his thoughts as the princess put on a new dress, covering up his sight.
131123.title: Kirby’s new home with the princess

choices: They decided to play with Kirby a bit first
They decided to inform the other girls of what was happening
They decided to go look for some shrunken boys
Princess Zelda suddenly entered the room
1312.content:
Princess Peach looked at the object closely, trying to figure out what was wrong with it. Kirby gave her a worried look, hoping she would identify him. Instead, the giantess shrugged and licked her lips.

“Oh well. Down the hatch.” Peach said. Kirby panicked and started to squirm. Princess Peach didn’t notice and brought him closer to her hungry mouth. The small warrior closed his eyes, fearing the worst. Before the giantess let go though, Palutena suddenly grabbed her arm and pulled it away from her mouth. Peach became confused and looked to see that the goddess was frowning.

“Hold on Peach.” She said. The giantess carefully grabbed Kirby and brought him closer to her face. Kirby became hopeful and started to squirm again.

“What’ wrong? Did it go bad?” Peach asked. Palutena shook her head and studied the item closely before realizing its true identity.

“Peach…this isn’t a berry. This isn’t food at all, it’s Kirby!” She said. Peach flinched and got a closer look as well. The tiny creature smiled and waved at them. The color drained from Princess Peach’s face before she went to sit down.

“Kirby…I almost swallowed you! I am so sorry!” She said. Palutena smiled and sat down next to her.

“Well he does it to us all the time. Besides, you didn’t know he was there. Right now, let’s just figure out what to do. If Kirby has shrunk, who else could be tiny?” The goddess thought about what to do. As they thought, something occurred to Peach.

“Oh my. I think I know what happened. This must be part of this year’s prank.” Palutena stomped her foot, startling Kirby. She remembered last year’s prank when all of her dresses had been turned pink. The goddess had been stuck wearing pink for a month which had been embarrassing. Palutena then looked at Kirby and thought for a moment before smiling.

“If this is a prank, then we can probably turn the tables on them.” The goddess stated. Princess Peach looked at her, wondering what she was thinking. Before she could react, Palutena tossed Kirby towards her, causing him to land in between her breasts. Peach blushed, causing her friend to giggle. “They’re now at our mercy. We can teach them the dangers of pranking a powerful goddess and a beautiful princess.”

Princess Peach pulled Kirby out and smiled. The puffball was really worried. They could do what they want to him, and had a desire for revenge. Although he had never pulled a prank on them personally, their smiles didn’t comfort him.

“We could even kill them if we wanted. After all, they’ll just respawn. Hm, how does angel cake sound?” Peach asked. The two girls giggled at the idea.
1312.title: A failed prank revealed

choices: Being A Pillow For The Goddess
133.content:
Kirby landed with a plop on a soft surface. When he got his bearings, he looked up to see the two ladies still talking. They were still completely unaware of him which made the star warrior nervous.

“Not yet. We’re going to wait for the others first.” Peach said. Palutena’s belly grumbled with disappointment.

“Oh very well, but can we at least have something?” The goddess asked. Peach smiled and opened the refrigerator. The princess pulled out a bowl of grapes making her friend smile.

“I thought ahead.” Peach said. She placed the bowl on the table and sat in her chair. Palutena grabbed a grape and popped it into her mouth. Within a second, she chewed it up and swallowed.

“Mm, it’s pretty tasty.” She started to sit down in her chair to join her friend. Kirby had no time to react as the giant butt rushed towards him and flattened him into a pancake.

Palutena wasn’t hurting Kirby due to his body’s durability and squishiness but he was now trapped under her. The goddess continued to snack on grapes unaware of the warrior she was on. Kirby tried to squirm out with little success.

“Hm?”

“What’s wrong Palutena?” Peach asked.

“I don’t know. My seat feels a little funny.” The woman responded. She shifted in her seat trying to get comfortable. Kirby yelled, all of her moments were pushing him around a bit. He soon found himself in between her butt cheeks. Half of his body was now free which game him some air. He was still stuck and starting to get annoyed at this. “I think that’s better.” Palutena said before grabbing another grape.

Kirby gave a sigh and decided…

Option 1: He was going to try and escape again. Palutena feels Kirby and grabs him. When she brings him up to her face, she thinks he’s just another grape.

Option 2: He was going to try and escape again. Palutena feels Kirby and grabs him. When she brings him up to her face, she soon recognizes him and sets him on the table.

Option 3: He was just going to wait things out. He stays quiet as Peach and Palutena have a lovely afternoon.

Option 4: He was just going to wait things out. After a bit of time, Princess Daisy enters the room.
133.title: Under The Beautiful Goddess

14.content:
“Ugh...what happened..?”

Pit was the first of the fighters to awaken. The angel warrior observed his surroundings, noticing the other guys were still out cold from the prank gone wrong. Mario, Kirby, Link...everyone else in the room was unconscious! Pit could even see the charred remains of Shulk’s device, except it looked much bigger.

No...the guys were just SMALLER! Understandably, Pit ran in panicked circles for a good minute, screaming like a little girl. The miniaturized angel only calmed down when he heard footsteps approaching the men’s locker room. Footsteps that sounded distinctly feminine.

“So not everyone was shrunk down...” Pit mused. “Perhaps I can get some help from whoever’s coming!”

Daringly, Pit sprinted out of the locker room in hopes of alerting the fighter unaffected by recent shrinking shenanigans. The giantess in question turned out to be...
14.title: Puny Pit

choices: Bayonetta discovered him and decided to make a deal with him
Bayonetta discovered him and decided to play with him
Pit fell off as Bayonetta was leaving, eventually being found by Rosalina
144.content:
As Pit laid his eyes on Bayonetta, he immediately became worried. She was known to kill angels and was always extremely tough on him in battle. He shuddered as he thought about her taunting him. The angel shook it off and watched as she got closer.

He was different from the other angels Bayonetta typically fought. Even though they didn’t usually get along, Pit still believed she would help him. As her giant foot landed in front of him, Pit jumped on and held tightly. Though he didn’t have the power of flight, he could still use his wings to help him jump.

Everything around Pit shook as Bayonetta continued to walk, unaware of his presence. The Umbra Witch decided to travel to New Donk City for some alone time. One thing she liked doing was visiting new interesting worlds. She found a nice restaurant and got herself a cup of tea, finding a table to sit at outside. She took a sip and gave a sigh, thinking about different matches.

As she relaxed, Pit took this opportunity to climb her. He really hoped she would help him in some way. Eventually…
144.title: A small angel, a large rival

1442.content:
Tiny Pit continued to scale Bayonetta’s towering body, from her shapely legs to her slim torso. The shrunken angel blushed, however, upon reaching the witch’s ample breasts. He wasn’t sure if he’d made the right decision...

As she finished another sip of tea, Bayonetta swore she felt something on her chest. Something small and white. It couldn’t possibly be a bug, could it? The Umbra Witch took a good look through bespectacled eyes at the familiar creature.

“Pit?!” Bayonetta interjected in a whisper, so as to avoid getting any unwanted attention. A smirk appeared on her face as she plucked the angel up with two fingers. “My, my...did this year’s prank go wrong, boy? Too bad for you, because...”
1442.title: Pit and the Giant Witch

choices: Palutena heard him and quickly teleported him into her hand.
Bayonetta returned to the smash arena and found another shrunken person
Pit was absorbed, but his conscience moved to Bayonetta’s breasts
Pit was absorbed, but his conscience was moved to Bayonetta’s belly
Pit woke up alive back at the smash arena
14421.content:
Pit’s eyes widened at her statement. The giantess giggled and gave him a kiss, causing him to blush. He started to squirm, feeling annoyed now.

“Come on Bayonetta, this isn’t the time for jokes! Please, you have to help me.” Pit said. The woman’s smile grew, making him worried. She grabbed his hands and dangled him.

“Who said I was joking? I really do feel hungry right now, and you’re the perfect size to be a snack. I bet your wings will taste nice.” She said. Pit’s face became white and started to struggle as much as he could.

“No! I’m not food, you can’t!” Pit yelled. The giantess ignored him and grabbed onto his feet with her lips. She started to suck on him lightly, causing Pit to giggle. As she pulled him out and smiled, Pit realized she had swallowed his shoes. Bayonetta licked her lips once more, teasing him. “If you eat me, Lady Palutena will punish you!” Pit yelled. The umbra witch laughed out loud.

“Oh please, I’m not afraid of her. Besides, I bet she was planning to eat you for dinner at some point anyways. I just got to you first.” She said. Bayonetta grinned, showing off her teeth. Pit whimpered, afraid of what was about to happen. “Say hello to my belly little angel.”

The giantess tossed Pit into her mouth and shut her lips up tightly. The shrunken boy screamed as he was tossed around. The carnivorous mouth bit down on him a couple of times, bruising him. He could hear the woman moan from his taste. Before he could react, the slimy tongue tossed him towards her throat, causing his screams to become louder.

Bayonetta swallowed Pit with ease, following the lump in her throat with her finger. As the boy landed in her stomach, she gave a burp and giggled. Meanwhile, Pit was struggling in the stomach acids. His wings were injured and couldn’t be used.

“Lady Palutena! Please help me!” He yelled, afraid. The shrunken angel couldn’t stop himself from going under the surface. He started to close his eyes, losing his strength.
14421.title: A tasty angel for the umbra witch

choices: Bayonetta notices Pit's struggles and teases him
Palutena hears Pit and tries to help him
144213.content:
Bayonetta rubbed her stomach with a smile, enjoying the sensations of Pit's struggles in there. Unbeknownst to the umbra witch, the angel didn't respawn after his body dissolved - he faced a much worse fate.

Pit awoke to notice something black in front of him. Confused, he tried to push it away, but found himself unable to move. He couldn't even feel his limbs at all! Whatever his new form was, it felt soft...and round.

"You gotta be kidding me..!" Pit thought. "I'm part of Bayonetta's breasts now! HELP! SOMEONE HELP ME!!"

The digested angel tried to squirm around in desperation, but his efforts merely amounted to tiny wobbles in his captor's boobs. Even after what Bayonetta had done to him, Pit still needed her to notice him. What did he have left to lose?
144213.title: Breast-Bound

144214.content:
Pit couldn’t stay awake much longer and passed out. Bayonetta gave a smile as her body digested him with ease. She patted her belly and relaxed. She wasn’t actually trying to be mean to him, she knew Palutena would just revive him later.

“Hm, you know, I bet that little angel wasn’t the only one shrunken.” The woman said. The idea of having a feast of tasty creatures excited her. She made up her mind and stood up, preparing to leave New Donk City.

When Pit woke up, he felt really weird. He tried to look around with little success. He tried to call out only for silence to return. After a few moments, he suddenly remembered what happened and started to panic.

“Wait, where am I?” He asked himself. The whole world was shaking and he couldn’t tell why. As he was trying to piece things together, a very loud rumble surrounded him. “What was that?” Pit suddenly screamed when a giant hand came towards him. The hand rubbed him, making the angel confused.

“That angel really didn’t fill me up. It’s a good thing there are more shrunken creatures.” Pit could hear Bayonetta say. The boy soon noticed they were in the smash arena. He could tell the Umbra witch still had him in her possession but he didn’t know where she was taking him. The giantess suddenly passed a mirror, allowing Pit to see himself. He screamed as he realized what was going on: he had become a part of Bayonetta’s belly!

He had been inside a giant’s stomach before but this time he was actually part of it. He tried to struggle to no avail. He wasn’t sure how but he knew he needed to get out of here, or at least get Bayonetta’s attention.

Within a few moments…

Option 1: Bayonetta spotted some tiny fighters on the ground. She licked her lips and started to walk towards them.

Option 2: Bayonetta made it to the girls locker room. Since all of the male fighters were shrunk, the umbra witch thought it would be fun to collect some allies

Option 3: Palutena suddenly heard Pit and learned about his problem.

Option 4: Pit kept trying to call out to Bayonetta. The umbra witch eventually heard him in her mind
144214.title: Close to the devourer of the angel

14422.content:
Pit was speechless as Bayonetta’s words escaped her mouth. He tried to escape her grasp, causing the giantess to smile. His struggles were only making her more interested in him.

“You can’t do this to me! I’m a person like you!” Pit yelled. The giantess chuckled and dropped him into the palm of her hand. The boy looked up, wishing Lady Palutena would save him.

“Oh can’t I? I’m sure that I can beat a weak creature like yourself.” Bayonetta said. She started to grin as an idea came to her. “But if you insist, I suppose I could find some other purpose for you.” Pit wished that made him feel safe, but her Titaness face said otherwise. The giantess slowly licked her lips, preparing herself.

“W-Wait, What are you…” The boy started to say. Before he could react, Bayonetta gave him a slow lick, covering the tiny angel in saliva. She gave a small moan and giggled.

“Mm, you’re pretty tasty. Since you don’t want to serve me, I’ll just eat you up. I’m feeling a bit hungry so a…small…snack, should do the trick.” The giantess said. She dangled Pit by his feet over her mouth, licking her lips in anticipation. The small fighter was yelling and squirming in terror

“Please! Don’t eat me! I don’t taste good, I swear!” He yelled. The giantess ignored him and released her grip, causing him to fall towards her mouth. “Alright, I’ll serve you! Just spare my life! Please!” Pit yelled. As he landed in her mouth, Bayonetta closed her mouth and started to taste him. His legs were sticking out but she didn’t care, she just wanted to savor this moment.

After a minute, she spat him out into her hand. Pit sat still, catching his breath. He had only been in one mouth his entire life, and that was Hades’s mouth. Both times, really weren’t pleasant. The giantess smiled at him, holding him carefully.

“That’s a good boy. Now, let’s go somewhere more private.” The umbra witch said. Pit stayed silent as the woman placed him in between her breasts and carried him out of New Donk City. As the giantess traveled, Pit eventually fell asleep.

When he woke up, Bayonetta was smiling at him. He looked around to see she had taken him to Dracula’s castle. The creepy environment made the angel shiver.

“This place is empty and will stay that way for a while. That means we’re now alone together.” The giantess said. Pit silently nodded, hoping she would go easy on him. “Now, since you are currently my masseuse, I want you to start rubbing my…”
14422.title: An umbra witch and an angel alone together

15.content: Who wakes up first, if not Mario, Link, Kirby or Pit?
15.title: More Choices

choices: ...makes it to somewhere else in Diamond City.
154.content:
After five minutes of unconsciousness, Wario gets up. He observes the room around him, witnessing his colleagues passed out and spread out the place. The floor tiles could now fill Diamond City if they wanted to. Shulk's device towers over everyone like a skyscraper. It doesn't appear to be functioning.

This could only mean one thing: everyone's tiny, the machine isn't working, everyone is unconscious, and it's all Kirby's fault.

"I knew we should've gone with my prank," Wario grumbled to himself. "It was way less risky. And it was a better prank idea."

In an effort to fix all of this, Wario runs to Shulk's humongous machine. He shoulder dashes into it, hoping that will fix it.

It didn't work.

"Well, I'm out of ideas," Wario said to himself. "If only there was a scientist who's good with fancy technology.."

Suddenly, he remembered. He knows a scientist who is good with fancy technology: Dr. Crygor!

Wario's face lit up. "That's it!" he exclaimed. "I'll get Dr. Crygor to fix this shrinking problem!"

He pulled out his motorcycle and headed for Dr. Crygor's laboratory in Diamond City.

The only problem now is the travel's gonna take longer because he's too tiny. He didn't mind because he knows that his motorcycle is the fastest vehicle ever.

During his voyage to Dr. Crygor's lab, Wario...
154.title: Wario's Time to GET OUTTA HERE

choices: ...Wario successfully makes it to Penny's lab.
...Wario ends up somewhere else in Diamond City.
...Wario goes back to Dr. Crygor's lab to mess with some equipment.
1541.content:
After traveling miles upon miles of being tiny on a usually 30-minute drive, Wario makes it to Dr. Crygor's lab. He parks his bike by the WELCOME mat and knocks on the gigantic front door.

"Hey, Crygor! You in there?!" he shouted, repeatedly pounding the door with his fist.

The door opens, and it wasn't Dr. Crygor answering the door.

It was his maid robot, Doris-1.

"Hello?" she answered, seeing no one in front of her.

Wario sighed an exasperated sigh. "Hey! Down here!" he yelled to the maid bot. She looked down to see a teeny tiny Wario.

"Oh hello, tiny Wario," she greeted in the most monotone voice ever. "What brings you here?"

"Let's just say that a prank went wrong back at Smash Bros., and all the guys are tiny. I need Dr. Crygor so he can fix this mess!"

"If your looking for the doctor, he's at Penny's lab."

Doris-1 shuts the door without a second thought.

Wario clenches his fists. His face scrunches up.

"Well, here we go again!" he moans. He goes back to his bike and rides to Penny's lab.

On the bright side, Penny's also a scientist, so the chances of fixing the calamity with Shulk's device might be higher.

Wario hops onto his motorbike and heads for Penny's lab. Hopefully, there will be no interruptions in finding any Crygor, be it Penny or Dr. Crygor.

During the trip...
1541.title: Success! ...kind of.

1542.content:
Wario knows the directions to Dr. Crygor's lab, but only when he's at his normal size.

All the traffic of the road passes by, making it harder to travel the road.

Throughout all this misdirection, Wario makes it to...
1542.title: Misdirection

choices: Turn back and go somewhere else.
15421.content:
Wario ends up at an apartment building. Judging by how tall it is, this must be where Mona lives.

However, she lives on the 9th floor, and the front door appears to have no way of sneaking under it.

There is an air vent on the side of the building, so getting to Mona might be possible. Or it might be easier to turn back and go somewhere else.
15421.title: ...Mona's place.

154211.content:
Wario shoulder-dashes through the air vent and begins driving inside on his motor cycle. This trip is so tiring because the tunnels are long and have no clear indication of where to go. The walls are too thin to climb easily, and he can't do any attempts of wall kicking, so he turned on the wall clinging wheels. Good thing Dr. Crygor built his motorcycle!

During the voyage through the long, metallic tunnels, Wario drives onto a vent and falls down the loose trap door. He suddenly lands on Mona's belly. Looks like all that traveling has payed off.

Mona appears to be taking a nap. She's wearing a red bikini, and she's napping on her back with her right arm up and her mouth slightly open. It looks like she's drooling a bit.

Wario hears a loud grumble coming from Mona's belly. She must be hungry.

All that's left to do now is wake her up and get her attention.
154211.title: Air Vent Journey

1542112.content:
Wario's landing might've caused a bit of an impact, because Mona began waking up.

She starts to sit up, stretching her arms and giving out a yawn. Suddenly, she spots a speck on her belly. She lifts her hand over to pick it up.

Meanwhile, Wario started sliding down Mona's belly as she got up. In able to hang on tight, he grabs onto one of her stomach hairs. Sadly, his motorbike was one with the movement and slid into her panties. He notices Mona's hand towering over him and gets picked up.

Mona lifts Wario up to her face.

"Mona! Thank goodness you're up!" Wario yelled. "I need you to get me to Dr. Crygor's lab. A freak accident happened at Smash Bros., and I need his science-ey help!"

While Wario was rambling about the situation at hand, Mona couldn't believe what she has in her hand. The man of her dreams is right in her possession. What more could she ask for?

Wario notices Mona just blankly staring at him. Her face is giving a hint of red, and her mouth is slightly open to the point she might drool or something. It probably didn't help the fact that she's still a bit tired.

"Uh, Mona?" said Wario. "Earth to Mona!" He waves his arms up and down, but Mona just gives the same blank stare.

Suddenly, Mona lifts Wario towards…
1542112.title: A Dream Come True

choices: No one answers. No choice but to go back.
Ashley or Red answer the door.
15422.content:
Wario's jaw dropped comically. This was the last place he needed to be! Sure, Ashley could use whatever magic she had to restore his size, but the kid was a demon spawn! There was no way she'd help him, let alone let Wario LIVE!

Then again, if he went back, he would just get lost again. Gritting his teeth, both in annoyance and fear, he went up to the door and pounded on it. Due to his new size, he needed to hit harder than usual, but hopefully it would do the job.
15422.title: ...Ashley's mansion.

155.content: Who else could possibly get up?
155.title: Someone else (again)

1553.content: Okay then who will it be then?
1553.title: Someone else (yet again)

15531.content: Okay which of the younger links?
15531.title: Toon Link or Young Link

choices: Krystal, heading to a special locker room for female assist trophies
Midna, looking for someone to hang out with
155311.content:
Toon Link woke up, not feeling completely good. He looked around to figure out what happened when he spotted all of his friends shrunken down. The boy looked up to see that Shulk’s machine had powered down.

Toon Link was worried. He had already been small enough, and now he was super small. He turned his head towards the others and decided the best option would to go seek help. He ran towards the door and into the hallway. The small boy looked around and shuddered at how giant everything was.

He shook it off and continued to run. As Toon Link traveled, he wished he was able to ride a train right now. The boy traveled for an hour before collapsing. At his size he wasn’t sure if he could find anyone. Just as he started to rest against the wall, loud tremors appeared. Link looked up to see…
155311.title: The small hero’s journey

choices: She stepped on Toon Link and got him trapped between her toes
She stepped on Toon Link and continued walking unaware of what happened
She stepped in front of Toon Link. He jumped onto her foot before she moved
Midna suddenly spotted him and thought he was a bug
Midna suddenly spotted him and figured out what/who he actually was
1553113.content:
The young boy was completely caught off guard by Midna. She was enormous, her height was similar to the tower of the gods. She was also incredibly beautiful and he had heard how mischievous she could be.

Midna looked around, hoping to find someone to talk to. She felt bored. There were a few matches going on, but all of them declined the use of assistant trophies. She was hoping to find Link, but he didn’t seem to be around.

Toon Link knew he didn’t have much time before she walked past him. He got in front of her and started waving his hands wildly. As the twilight princess got closer, the small boy became worried.
1553113.title: A tall imp

15531135.content:
Midna was about to walk past when she noticed a small figure on the ground. Using her magic, she picked him up and set him in the palm of her hand. Toon Link stayed completely still. Now that he was up close, her size was pretty intimidating, especially since she had a visible sharp tooth.

Midna wasn’t sure what he was at first. Her first guess was that he was some sort of bug. She considered setting it on the ground and feeling it squirm under her foot. Upon closer inspection though, she soon realized it was Link! It wasn’t her Link, rather it was the hero of the winds, but the fact he was this small caught her off guard.

“Link? What happened to you?” She asked. Toon Link told her about the machine that had shrunk him and what it was supposed to be for. Midna gave him an unamused look. “Well then, you probably deserve this for trying to prank us.” Link then asked for her help.

The twilight princess knew she should probably help Link Andy the others get back to normal. However, a thought had occurred to her. She always liked teasing Link and now this one was literally a bug to her. She could do anything she wanted and her friend would have to oblige. It didn’t help that she was still bored. Link could see her having a hard time deciding making him worried.

Midna eventually gave him a smile.

Option 1: She decided to help him. She went and got Princess Zelda for backup.

Option 2: She decided she wasn’t going to waste this opportunity. She took him to the peaceful planet (Mario galaxy map) to have some fun with him.

Option 3: She decided to use him for her own prank. She found Daisy and decided snuck Toon Link into her food.

Option 4: She decided to help him but he was going to play with her first.
15531135.title: Found by the Twilight Princess

155312.content:
Young Link had awoken and noticed that everyone else was still asleep. So rather than trying to wake them all up he decided to leave the locker room and get help. Besides it would be rather difficult for such a large group people to stick together to get help.

Young Link managed to get out of the locker room and thankfully saw someone walk past the locker room but who is it?
155312.title: Young Link

1553322.content: Perhaps we should follow some shrunken women?
1553322.title: Someone else

15533221.content: Even if they can be both gender, let's say this is you. So, the question is, what's your class?
15533221.title: Mii Fighters

155332211.content: Do you want the Mii Brawler or do you want more!?
155332211.title: No final choices here!

1553322112.content: In honor of them being brought into the game, how about one of the Byleths?
1553322112.title: GIVE ME MORE!

15533221122.content: The fact that Joker wasn't an option yet is weird.
15533221122.title: Joker

155332212.content: Final choice I swear! Also your name could be anything.
155332212.title: Final choice

1553322122.content:
You wake up on a red carpet. You remembered talking to Mega Man and Banjo and Kazooie until a blinding white light engulfed you and your friends. You powered up your arm cannon and began your journey to find your friends. Two massive doors stood in front of you, each with a different symbol. One was the Smash Bros. logo and the other was a Spirits logo. Both were colored in pink. You later remembered that the dorms were separated for boys and girls so they won't do anything "naughty." Sakurai did say it was for "Good Boys and Girls." (Actually it's because of rating issues which is why Mai isn't in Smash)

You decided to walk through the.....
1553322122.title: Super Fighting Mii...... Mii Gunner!

15533221221.content:
You entered through the door to find a large hallway filled with more doors. If you remembered correctly, (and you do) each room has two girls in them. The door in front of you had a mix between orange and pink. The symbol had a image of a peach and a daisy. This room belonged to Princess Peach and Princess Daisy.

Their door was opened slightly so you could enter inside or head to the other set of rooms.
15533221221.title: CHOOSE YOUR FIGHTER!

155332212211.content:
You squeezed your way through the opening and came across a beautifully decorated room, fit for royalty. The beds were queen sized, one was pink, the other was orange. What made this room unique was the outdoor patio that had a perfect view of the Battlefield stage.

You looked around to find that now one was here. You were about to leave untill you heard the sound of.....
155332212211.title: A Royal Suite

info.brief_description: The males of Smash somehow become tiny near the females.
info.description:
Through an unforeseen mishap, the male fighters of Super Smash Bros Ultimate find themselves shrunken and at the mercy of the unaware females. Will the guys get the gals' attention? Or will they fail in embarrassing ways?

Rules:

1. No futanari, diapers, age/gender change, watersports, scat, cock vore, or male giants.
2. Please use proper grammar.
3. Chapters must be at least a paragraph long (unless they're choice chapters).
4. Don't put too many choice chapters in a row.
5. Non-playable characters may be interacted with, as long as they appear in a Smash game in some way.

This interactive takes place after the events of World of Light, at which point the non-playable characters have their physical forms back. Super Smash Bros and all its characters belong to their respective owners.

If you're not sure about something, feel free to ask me.
